feed.title: Category: August | Life ,The Universe and The Thing

entry.title: Hello Octopress
entry.content:
Hello World

This post has been some time coming. So I won’t keep this too long.

This Blog is hosted on github-pages by Octopress, The Blogging platform for hackers. Settingup did take some time, but then again that was becuase of the problems with pantheon. That reminds me, Been using elementaryOS “luna” for about a week now,And i must say, WOW. Not to say i didn’t have my fair share of set up worries, but then again that’s what i love about the whole experience.
